taskActivities.query: SELECT Id, TAG_ActivityType__c, TAG_service__c, Subject, CreatedDate, LastModifiedDate, Account.Name, Account.INT_OrganizationNumber__c, Account.CRM_AccountType__c, Account.Id, Account.TAG_Partner_Status__c, Account.INT_Industry__c, Account.TAG_Main_Industry__c, Account.Shipping_State__c, Account.INT_MunicipalityNumber__c, Account.INT_OrganizationalStructure__c, Account.INT_Sector__c FROM Task

eventActivities.query: SELECT Id, TAG_ActivityType__c, TAG_service__c, Subject, CreatedDate, LastModifiedDate, Account.Name, Account.INT_OrganizationNumber__c, Account.CRM_AccountType__c, Account.Id, Account.TAG_Partner_Status__c, Account.INT_Industry__c, Account.TAG_Main_Industry__c, Account.Shipping_State__c, Account.INT_MunicipalityNumber__c, Account.INT_OrganizationalStructure__c, Account.INT_Sector__c FROM Event
